#summary mediumpurple is a color keyword defined in CSS and usable wherever a color value is required.
#labels about-css

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSColors Colors] > *mediumpurple*

== Value ==

The `mediumpurple` color keyword is equivalent to `#9370db`, except in Safari, which treats it as `#9370d8`.

[CSSColors List of CSS color constants]
